# `getUrl()`

Use `nhost.graphql.getUrl` to get the GraphQL URL.

:::caution Deprecated
Use `nhost.graphql.httpUrl` and `nhost.graphql.wsUrl` instead.
:::

```ts
const url = nhost.graphql.getUrl()
```
